title: i got hacked and i need help getting my account back
body: i went on a scam website just minding my own and then i get a message saying free rp and i put in my username and password and now i cant get back in some one help{{champion:432}}

replies.body: Uh oh!  It sucks that there are some out there trying to ruse players, and I want to help get you back in-game!  As a first step, try out our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to recover of your account.  If you have issues, don't worry.  Just reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and we'll help out!
